tags.name: Controls
tags.description: Manage the controls in the work item form layout for a process using inherited customization.

tags.name: Groups
tags.description: Manage the groups in the work item form layout for a process using inherited customization.

tags.name: Layout
tags.description: Gets the full work item form layout for a process using inherited customization.

tags.name: Pages
tags.description: Manage the pages in the work item form layout for a process using inherited customization.

tags.name: System Controls
tags.description: System controls like Area Path, Iteration Path and Reason can be hidden from work item form using these API(s). In additon to hide them, lables to these controls can also be edited.

AddProcessWorkItemTypeFieldRequest.description: Class that describes a request to add a field in a work item type.

allowedValues.description: The list of field allowed values.

allowGroups.description: Allow setting field value to a group identity. Only applies to identity fields.

defaultValue.description: The default value of the field.

readOnly.description: If true the field cannot be edited.

required.description: If true the field cannot be empty.

Control.description: Represent a control in the form.

height.description: Height of the control, for html controls.

id.description: The id for the layout node.

inherited.description: A value indicating whether this layout node has been inherited. from a parent layout.  This is expected to only be only set by the combiner.

isContribution.description: A value indicating if the layout node is contribution or not.

order.description: Order in which the control should appear in its group.

overridden.description: A value indicating whether this layout node has been overridden . by a child layout.

readOnly.description: A value indicating if the control is readonly.

visible.description: A value indicating if the control should be hidden or not.

parentProcessTypeId.description: The ID of the parent process

referenceName.description: Reference name of process being created. If not specified, server will assign a unique reference name

CreateProcessRuleRequest.description: Request object/class for creating a rule on a work item type.

actions.description: List of actions to take when the rule is triggered.

conditions.description: List of conditions when the rule should be triggered.

isDisabled.description: Indicates if the rule is disabled.

CreateProcessWorkItemTypeRequest.description: Class for create work item type request

color.description: Color hexadecimal code to represent the work item type

description.description: Description of the work item type

icon.description: Icon to represent the work item type

inheritsFrom.description: Parent work item type for work item type

isDisabled.description: True if the work item type need to be disabled

Extension.description: Represents the extensions part of the layout

values.description: String field type.
Integer field type.
DateTime field type.
Plain text field type.
HTML (Multiline) field type.
Treepath field type.
History field type.
Double field type.
Guid field type.
Boolean field type.
Identity field type.
Integer picklist field type.
String picklist field type.
Double picklist field type.

FormLayout.description: Describes the layout of a work item type

pages.description: Top level tabs of the layout.

Group.description: Represent a group in the form that holds controls in it.

controls.description: Controls to be put in the group.

id.description: The id for the layout node.

inherited.description: A value indicating whether this layout node has been inherited from a parent layout.  This is expected to only be only set by the combiner.

isContribution.description: A value indicating if the layout node is contribution are not.

order.description: Order in which the group should appear in the section.

overridden.description: A value indicating whether this layout node has been overridden by a child layout.

visible.description: A value indicating if the group should be hidden or not.

HideStateModel.description: Class that describes the work item state is hidden.

hidden.description: Returns 'true', if workitem state is hidden, 'false' otherwise.

Page.description: Describes a page in the work item form layout

id.description: The id for the layout node.

inherited.description: A value indicating whether this layout node has been inherited from a parent layout.  This is expected to only be only set by the combiner.

isContribution.description: A value indicating if the layout node is contribution are not.

locked.description: A value indicating whether any user operations are permitted on this page and the contents of this page

order.description: Order in which the page should appear in the layout.

overridden.description: A value indicating whether this layout node has been overridden by a child layout.

values.description: Custom page type.
History page type.
Link page type.
Attachment page type.

visible.description: A value indicating if the page should be hidden or not.

isSuggested.description: Indicates whether items outside of suggested list are allowed

customization.description: Indicates the type of customization on this work item. System behaviors are inherited from parent process but not modified. Inherited behaviors are modified behaviors that were inherited from parent process. Custom behaviors are behaviors created by user in current process.

values.description: Customization-type is System if is system generated workitemtype.
Customization-type is Inherited if the existing workitemtype of inherited process is customized.
Customization-type is Custom if the newly created workitemtype is customized.

referenceName.description: ReferenceName is optional, if not specified will be auto-generated.

customizationType.description: Indicates the type of customization on this process. System Process is default process. Inherited Process is modified process that was System process before.

values.description: Customization-type is System if is system generated workitemtype.
Customization-type is Inherited if the existing workitemtype of inherited process is customized.
Customization-type is Custom if the newly created workitemtype is customized.

projects.description: Projects in this process to which the user is subscribed to.

customizationType.description: Indicates if the rule is system generated or created by user.

values.description: Customization-type is System if is system generated workitemtype.
Customization-type is Inherited if the existing workitemtype of inherited process is customized.
Customization-type is Custom if the newly created workitemtype is customized.

id.description: Id to uniquely identify the rule.

ProcessWorkItemType.description: Class that describes a work item type object

color.description: Color hexadecimal code to represent the work item type

customization.description: Indicates the type of customization on this work item System work item types are inherited from parent process but not modified Inherited work item types are modified work item that were inherited from parent process Custom work item types are work item types that were created in the current process

values.description: Customization-type is System if is system generated workitemtype.
Customization-type is Inherited if the existing workitemtype of inherited process is customized.
Customization-type is Custom if the newly created workitemtype is customized.

description.description: Description of the work item type

icon.description: Icon to represent the work item typ

inherits.description: Reference name of the parent work item type

isDisabled.description: Indicates if a work item type is disabled

name.description: Name of the work item type

referenceName.description: Reference name of work item type

url.description: Url of the work item type

ProcessWorkItemTypeField.description: Class that describes a field in a work item type and its properties.

allowedValues.description: The list of field allowed values.

allowGroups.description: Allow setting field value to a group identity. Only applies to identity fields.

customization.description: Indicates the type of customization on this work item.

values.description: Customization-type is System if is system generated workitemtype.
Customization-type is Inherited if the existing workitemtype of inherited process is customized.
Customization-type is Custom if the newly created workitemtype is customized.

defaultValue.description: The default value of the field.

isLocked.description: Information about field definition being locked for editing

readOnly.description: If true the field cannot be edited.

required.description: If true the field cannot be empty.

values.description: String field type.
Integer field type.
DateTime field type.
Plain text field type.
HTML (Multiline) field type.
Treepath field type.
History field type.
Double field type.
Guid field type.
Boolean field type.
Identity field type.
Integer picklist field type.
String picklist field type.
Double picklist field type.

RuleAction.description: Action to take when the rule is triggered.

actionType.description: Type of action to take when the rule is triggered.

values.description: Make the target field required. Example : {"actionType":"$makeRequired","targetField":"Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Activity","value":""}
Make the target field read-only. Example : {"actionType":"$makeReadOnly","targetField":"Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Activity","value":""}
Set a default value on the target field. This is used if the user creates a integer/string field and sets a default value of this field.
Set the default value on the target field from server clock. This is used if user creates the field like Date/Time and uses default value.
Set the default current user value on the target field. This is used if the user creates the field of type identity and uses default value.
Set the default value on from existing field to the target field.  This used wants to set a existing field value to the current field.
Set the value of target field to given value. Example : {actionType: "$copyValue", targetField: "ScrumInherited.mypicklist", value: "samplevalue"}
Set the value from clock.
Set the current user to the target field. Example : {"actionType":"$copyFromCurrentUser","targetField":"System.AssignedTo","value":""}.

Copy the value from a specified field and set to target field. Example : {actionType: "$copyFromField", targetField: "System.AssignedTo", value:"System.ChangedBy"}. Here, value is copied from "System.ChangedBy" and set to "System.AssingedTo" field.
Set the value of the target field to empty.
Use the current time to set the value of the target field. Example : {actionType: "$copyFromServerClock", targetField: "System.CreatedDate", value: ""}
Use the current user to set the value of the target field.
Hides target field from the form. This is a server side only action.
Disallows a field from being set to a specific value.

targetField.description: Field on which the action should be taken.

value.description: Value to apply on target field, once the action is taken.

RuleActionModel.description: Action to take when the rule is triggered.

RuleCondition.description: Defines a condition on a field when the rule should be triggered.

conditionType.description: Type of condition. $When. This condition limits the execution of its children to cases when another field has a particular value, i.e. when the Is value of the referenced field is equal to the given literal value. $WhenNot.This condition limits the execution of its children to cases when another field does not have a particular value, i.e.when the Is value of the referenced field is not equal to the given literal value. $WhenChanged.This condition limits the execution of its children to cases when another field has changed, i.e.when the Is value of the referenced field is not equal to the Was value of that field. $WhenNotChanged.This condition limits the execution of its children to cases when another field has not changed, i.e.when the Is value of the referenced field is equal to the Was value of that field.

values.description: $When. This condition limits the execution of its children to cases when another field has a particular value, i.e. when the Is value of the referenced field is equal to the given literal value.

$WhenNot.This condition limits the execution of its children to cases when another field does not have a particular value, i.e.when the Is value of the referenced field is not equal to the given literal value.
$WhenChanged.This condition limits the execution of its children to cases when another field has changed, i.e.when the Is value of the referenced field is not equal to the Was value of that field.
$WhenNotChanged.This condition limits the execution of its children to cases when another field has not changed, i.e.when the Is value of the referenced field is equal to the Was value of that field.

$WhenWas. This condition limits the execution of its children to cases when another field value is changed from one value to another. e.g. If the condition is : When the work item state changes from New to Approved, here $WhenWas clause defines the "New" state of the workitem and $When clause defines "Approved" state.

This condition checks if current user is member of a particular group. This condition does not have any 1:1 mapping with any server side rule condition, rather this is a dummy condition added for customer simplicity of understanding. This condition is later translated to a FOR membership filter . e.g. If the condition is : WhenCurrentUserIsMemberOfGroup "Approvers" then "MakeRequired" Field1.Here it translates to a For rule , "MakeRequired" for "Approvers"

This condition checks if current user is not member of a particular group. This condition does not have any 1:1 mapping with any server side rule condition, rather this is a dummy condition added for customer simplicity of understanding. This condition is later translated to a NOT membership filter . e.g. If the condition is : WhenCurrentUserIsNotMemberOfGroup "Approvers" then "MakeRequired" Field1.Here it translates to a Not rule , "MakeRequired" not "Approvers"

value.description: Value of field to define the condition for rule.

Section.description: Defines a section of the work item form layout

groups.description: List of child groups in this section

id.description: The id for the layout node.

overridden.description: A value indicating whether this layout node has been overridden by a child layout.

UpdateProcessModel.description: Describes a request to update a process

isDefault.description: If true new projects will use this process by default

isEnabled.description: If false the process will be disabled and cannot be used to create projects

UpdateProcessRuleRequest.description: Request class/object to update the rule.

id.description: Id to uniquely identify the rule.

UpdateProcessWorkItemTypeFieldRequest.description: Class to describe a request that updates a field's properties in a work item type.

allowedValues.description: The list of field allowed values.

allowGroups.description: Allow setting field value to a group identity. Only applies to identity fields.

defaultValue.description: The default value of the field.

readOnly.description: If true the field cannot be edited.

required.description: The default value of the field.

UpdateProcessWorkItemTypeRequest.description: Class for update request on a work item type

color.description: Color of the work item type

description.description: Description of the work item type

icon.description: Icon of the work item type

isDisabled.description: If set will disable the work item type

VssJsonCollectionWrapper.description: This class is used to serialize collections as a single JSON object on the wire.

WitContribution.description: Properties of a work item form contribution

inputs.description: A dictionary holding key value pairs for contribution inputs.

showOnDeletedWorkItem.description: A value indicating if the contribution should be show on deleted workItem.

WorkItemBehaviorReference.description: Reference to the behavior of a work item type.

id.description: The ID of the reference behavior.

url.description: The url of the reference behavior.

WorkItemStateInputModel.description: Class That represents a work item state input.

order.description: Order in which state should appear

WorkItemStateResultModel.description: Class that represents a work item state result.

values.description: Customization-type is System if is system generated workitemtype.
Customization-type is Inherited if the existing workitemtype of inherited process is customized.
Customization-type is Custom if the newly created workitemtype is customized.

hidden.description: If the Work item state is hidden.

WorkItemTypeBehavior.description: Association between a work item type and it's behavior

behavior.description: Reference to the behavior of a work item type

isDefault.description: If true the work item type is the default work item type in the behavior

isLegacyDefault.description: If true the work item type is the default work item type in the parent behavior

url.description: URL of the work item type behavior

inherits.description: Parent WIT Id/Internal ReferenceName that it inherits from

api-Version-preview.1.name: api-version
api-Version-preview.1.description: Version of the API to use.  This should be set to '7.2-preview.1' to use this version of the api.

api-Version-preview.2.name: api-version
api-Version-preview.2.description: Version of the API to use.  This should be set to '7.2-preview.2' to use this version of the api.

accessToken.description: Personal access token. Use any value for the user name and the token as the password.

scopes.vso.work: Grants the ability to read work items, queries, boards, area and iterations paths, and other work item tracking related metadata. Also grants the ability to execute queries, search work items and to receive notifications about work item events via service hooks.
scopes.vso.work_write: Grants the ability to read, create, and update work items and queries, update board metadata, read area and iterations paths other work item tracking related metadata, execute queries, and to receive notifications about work item events via service hooks.
